snippet: Joe Moglia has had a twisting life story, going from football coach to corporate executive and back, and he is now leading Coastal Carolina’s successful football program.
abstract: Profile of Joe Moglia, coach of the Coastal Carolina University football team, whose remarkable, twisting career has taken him from a fledgling position in coaching to immense success on Wall Street, and back again.
lead_paragraph: Joe Moglia has had a twisting life story, going from football coach to corporate executive and back, and he is now leading Coastal Carolina’s successful football program.

headline.seo: Joe Moglia's Journey From Corporate Executive to F.C.S. Success Story
headline.main: Trading Finance for Football Results in Substantial Gains
headline.print_headline: Trading Finance for Football Results in Substantial Gains
